Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Cases reported by the FDA showed clarithromycin and ciprofloxacin to be the most frequently associated with the development of mania .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| mania |

In this paragraph, the disease entity is "mania". The paragraph states that mania was the condition that was most frequently associated with the use of clarithromycin and ciprofloxacin, according to the cases reported by the FDA.
